index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to a grant from the Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) for the purpose of implementing the Neighborhood Equitable Transit Oriented Development (NET) Initiative, a three year effort to implement priorities identified in the Rainier Valley and Beacon Hill neighborhood plans; authorizing acceptance of the grant funds; authorizing related agreements and actions; amending the 2012 Adopted Budget by creating a new Budget Control Level (BCL) for the purposes of the NET Initiative and providing an appropriation for the new BCL; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Housing, Human Services, Health, and Culture
